articles.title: Congratulations to 18th International Meeting of Communist Parties and Workers' Parties
articles.content:
Congratulations to 18th International Meeting of Communist Parties and Workers' Parties
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Friday sent a message of greeting to the 18th international meeting of communist parties and workers' parties.
					 The message said that the international meeting that has been held century after century has successfully carried out its mission and purpose in  exchanging successes and experience made in the struggle to frustrate the imperialists' moves against socialism and steadily advance the socialist movement and in strengthening mutual support and solidarity. 
					
					 It wished the meeting great success in its work, expressing the belief that it will be an important occasion for communist parties and workers' parties to victoriously advance the socialist cause with correct strategy and tactics to cope with the escalating confrontation between independent forces and hegemonic forces.

articles.title: Greetings to Foreign Minister of Czech Republic
articles.content:
Greetings to Foreign Minister of Czech Republic
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Friday sent a message of greeting to Lubomir Zaoralek, foreign minister of the Czech Republic, on its national day. 
					 The message expressed belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would develop favorably.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Minister of External Relations of Cameroon
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Minister of External Relations of Cameroon
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Lejeune Mbella Mbella, minister of External Relations of Cameroon, with regard to a train accident in Cameroon which claimed many casualties. 
					 Extending deep sympathy and condolences to the Cameroonian government, people and bereaved families of the victims, the message expressed the belief that they would eradicate the aftermath of the accident as early as possible and achieve successes in the work for political stability of the country and national unity.

articles.title: Workshop for Participants in Seventh Congress of GFTUK Held
articles.content:
Workshop for Participants in Seventh Congress of GFTUK Held
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A workshop for the participants in the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) took place here on Friday.
					 The speakers referred to the issues of deeply grasping the basic idea and contents of the letter sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to the participants in the congress and further strengthening the GFTUK into a mass political organization of the working class faithful to the Party, the powerful combat force for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Explained at the workshop were the basic contents of Kim Jong Un's letter "The Duty of the Working Class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the Times and the Tasks Facing Trade Union Organizations".
					
					 The workshop underlined to firmly defend, preserve and eternally glorify the leadership feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in the work of the GFTUK.
					
					 The speakers underscored the need for the GFTUK to fully perform its mission and duty as befits the mass political organization of the heroic working class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the on-going general offensive to hasten the final victory in the drive for building a powerful socialist country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Participants in Seventh Congress of GFTUK Enjoy Art Performance
articles.content:
Participants in Seventh Congress of GFTUK Enjoy Art Performance
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions (GFTUK) enjoyed drama "Blood Vessel."
					 The drama deeply impressed the audience as it depicted the workers of the Sangwon Cement Complex who attained their high production goal by giving priority to science and technology.
					
					 The participants also enjoyed music and dance story "Life Story of Youth". The performers truthfully depicted the noble spiritual world of the members of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade.
					
					 The participants also watched an art performance given by the Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the GFTUK and an art presentation given by its primary organizations marking its Seventh Congress.
					
					 Meanwhile, they went round the exhibition of achievements made in the work of the GFTUK and spent a pleasant time at the Munsu Water Park.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Congratulate Girls Footballers
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Congratulate Girls Footballers
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- There took place at the Central Youth Hall Friday a meeting to congratulate the girls footballers who won the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup.
					 Present at the meeting were officials concerned, those in the field of sports, working people, players, coaches and youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 Party and state commendations were awarded to members of the girls football team.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made.
					
					 Speakers said the girls footballers who demonstrated the spirit of Songun Korea are proud daughters of the country and reliable mistresses of youth power and Mallima riders.
					
					 They called for continuously creating legendary stories about world- startling sports successes of heroic Korea in international games. 
					
					 Speeches were made to renew pledges.
					
					 The speakers expressed the will to firmly prepare themselves as sportspersons strong in thinking and morality and physical bodies and technique and thus demonstrate their stamina of certain victory of Juche Korea before the world with gold medals.

articles.title: Anniversary of Central Bank Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Central Bank Marked
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Central Bank of the DPRK marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the Central Bank of North Korea on October 29, Juche 35 (1946), established the advantageous financial and monetary management system of Korean style and led it to successfully fulfil its function and role.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche-based idea and theory of the President on finance and money, providing the guidelines for improving the financial and monetary work.
					
					 He saw to it that all financial business was oriented to implementing the Party's policy of finance and money and showed deep loving care and trust for the financial workers.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un led the Central Bank to further improve its function and role as required by the reality in which the building of a powerful socialist country is being conducted on a higher stage, and made sure that its building was built on the picturesque bank of the River Taedong.
					
					 Under the care of the peerlessly great men the Central Bank has developed into an effective state financial guidance institution guaranteeing socialist construction and the material and cultural life of the people with finance, having a big share in strengthening the country's financial and monetary foundation.
					
					 A meeting marking the anniversary took place on Friday.

articles.title: 13th National Nano Sci-tech Presentation and Show Closed
articles.content:
13th National Nano Sci-tech Presentation and Show Closed
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The 13th national nano sci-tech presentation and show were closed with due ceremony at the State Nanotechnology Bureau Friday.
					 The presentation and show were sponsored by the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea. They introduced successes made in the scientific researches into solving the issues of epochal significance in building an economic power with nano technology.
					
					 There took place workshops.

articles.title: Housing Construction in Flood-hit Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Housing Construction in Flood-hit Areas of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The housing construction progresses apace in flood-hit North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 Builders of the province are pushing at the final stage the construction of one-storied or multi-storied houses in Onsong and other counties.
					
					 In Onthan and Wangjaesan-ri of Onsong County, they have carried out their housing construction at 90 percent.

articles.title: Youths Play Key Role in Recovery Efforts
articles.content:
Youths Play Key Role in Recovery Efforts
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Young people of the DPRK have turned out in a drive to restore the flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province.
					 Kye Ung Sang Agricultural College under Kim Il Sung University and Technological College of Hwangbuk University dispatched the youth agitation troupe and brass band to the Sangwon Cement Complex to inspire its workers to the increased production.
					
					 In Nampho City, schoolchildren launched the art squad and brass band activities encouraging the steel production.
					
					 The young employees at various units under the Ministry of Railways took the lead in the transportation of freights through a socialist emulation movement.
					
					 Meanwhile, at least 70 000 youths from across the country volunteered to take part in the recovery effort in disaster areas.
					
					 The members of youth shock brigades including the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade have worked admirable feats in the housing construction and the restoration of damaged railways in flood-hit North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The youths at industrial establishments across the country, too, are playing a leading role in the production of building materials and consumer goods needed for the recovery efforts in the disaster areas.

articles.title: Forest Restoration Campaign Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Forest Restoration Campaign Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- People in the DPRK are directing sustained efforts to the forest restoration, true to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to turn the whole country into a thick woodland.
					 Songgan County of Jagang Province has cultivated tens of thousands of healthy saplings of acacia, pine and other trees at nurseries built in its different parts.
					
					 The inhabitants of Kaesong City built a new mother nursery in Pakyon area to cultivate on a large scale various species of saplings, including pine-nut tree and Larix lepolepis.
					
					 Yodok County of South Hamgyong Province is vigorously conducting its planned forest restoration works such as collecting seeds and digging holes, with the autumn period of the general mobilization for land administration as an occasion.
					
					 The Singye County Forestry Management Station in North Hwanghae Province laid a foundation for producing millions of saplings by ensuring their rooting rate at nearly 100 percent.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails Park Geun Hye Group's "Row about Followers of North"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails Park Geun Hye Group's "Row about Followers of North"
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group is busy kicking up the "row about followers of the north" in a bid to prolong their remaining days.
					 These days the "Saenuri Party" and other puppet conservative forces are getting frantic in suppressing opposition party, claiming it was disclosed that Mun Jae In, who had been the "presidential" chief of staff during the Roh Moo Hyun regime, and others abstained from voting for the adoption of the "resolution on human rights in the north" at the UN "in collusion with the north" in November 2007.
					
					 Producing a book allegedly authored by the former minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, the conservative forces deliberately linked an opposition party with the north and kicked off the "row about followers of the north". The true nature of the row became clear from the beginning. 
					
					 This is nothing but a third-rate farce of the Park group at the jaw of death to tide over the serious ruling crisis by diverting elsewhere the attention of the angry people.
					
					 It is the customary method of the successive puppet ruling quarters to seek a way out in cooking up anti-north conspiratorial cases whenever they were facing a crisis.
					
					 Typical of them were the Progressive Party case fabricated by traitor Syngman Rhee, the People's Revolutionary Party case cooked up by traitor Park Chung Hee, Kwangju massacre perpetrated by Chun Doo Hwan and Roh Tae Woo military junta, the Wangjaesan incident orchestrated by Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 Park Geun Hye seized power through such plots and intrigues.
					
					 It was brought to light that the conservative group kicked off the "row about followers of the north" by unhesitatingly cooking up the north-south summit minutes in an effort to turn in their favor the situation before the election which had become unfavorable due to the case of the Chung-Soo Society with the approach of the "presidential" election in 2012.
					
					 Since the seizure of power the conservative forces have quelled the discontent and resistance of south Koreans from all walks of life by using the story of "followers of the north" as cure-all. They cracked down upon legitimate political parties, organizations, lawmakers, religionists, ordinary people and housewives by branding them as "followers of the north" if they courted their displeasure.
					
					 The recent case was another despicable farce orchestrated by the conservative forces to weather their crisis.
					
					 The puppet conservative forces are, indeed, snobs and shameless political charlatans who do not hesitate to do anything mean and absurd to grab dictatorial power.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" and other puppet conservative forces forsaken by the people are sadly mistaken if they calculate that they can get something through the above-said row.
					
					 Their hysteric row would only show the miserable plight of Park Geun Hye and other politicians stuck in the abyss of ruin.
					
					 Their row set the stage for deepening the political chaos in south Korea and made all south Koreans shake with towering resentment at Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party".
					
					 All south Koreans irrespective of political affiliation, political view, sex, religion, age and residence unanimously demand impeachment of Park. "Park Geun Hye's impeachment" and "resignation" are the first words that appear on the internet and the public comments that Park Geun Hye stands at the crossroads of whether she steps down herself or dethroned through resistance.
					
					 It is too late for the wicked group of traitors to tide over their crisis.

articles.title: KCNA Urges Japanese Reactionaries to Behave Themselves
articles.content:
KCNA Urges Japanese Reactionaries to Behave Themselves
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are showing symptoms of hysteria again while talking about the "additional sanctions" upon the DPRK.
					 Japanese Foreign Minister Kishida on Oct. 25 pulled up the DPRK's measures for bolstering up self-defence capability and spouted such invective that "it is important to ratchet up the pressure while cooperating with international community" and "independent measure together with measure through the UNSC is in the pipeline".
					
					 He asserted that he has a "will to examine the tightening of sanctions including the expansion of sanctions on businesses of third countries related to north Korea". 
					
					 Japan has not yet shaken off the ill-fame of an enemy state. It is a ridiculous act that Kishida, who stands in the van of humiliating diplomacy, spouted such litany of rigmaroles as "tightening of sanctions", still unaware of where he stands.
					
					 Japan is a top-class war criminal state as it occupied Korea and committed hideous unethical crimes for over four decades in the last century.
					
					 In the past the Japanese imperialists forcibly drafted more than 8.4 million young and middle aged  Korean people, mercilessly killed over one million people, kidnapped, raped and forcibly drafted 200 000 Korean women ranging from teens to married women in a bid to force them into sexual slavery at battle sites.
					
					 Nowhere in the world can be found such a criminal state which made women in different countries sexual slaves, a means for raising the morale of aggression forces as the Japanese imperialists did.
					
					 Japan is still on the dock as it justified the aggression of Korea by itself and left the Korean people indelible grudge, far from admitting the war crimes. Under such situation, Japan is talking about putting sanctions upon the victimized state. This is the vicious and heinous provocation little short of adding to the crimes it already committed.
					
					 Japan, the worst human right criminal state which is not entitled to talk about the human rights, seeks to check the overseas dispatch of workers while mentioning someone's "human rights issue". This is an unpardonable violation of human rights and impudent interference in the internal affairs of a sovereign state.
					
					 Kishida's remarks go to clearly prove once again that Japan is the sworn enemy that inflicted immeasurable misfortune and pain on the Korean people in the past and it makes desperate efforts in the van to prevent the independent development of the DPRK.
					
					 The just nuclear striking means of our revolutionary armed forces, powerful treasured sword of protecting the nation's sovereignty and right to existence to cope with the increased U.S. and other hostile forces' moves to stifle the DPRK, are ready to mount a preemptive attack if enemies make even the slightest provocation.
					
					 Japan's frantic moves to put sanctions upon the DPRK, following in the footsteps of its master, will bring it closer to the sight of the DPRK.
					
					 The responsibility for the consequences will be held by the reckless reactionary forces of Japan like Kishida.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA)　-- The south Korean puppet forces are desperately pushing ahead with the enforcement of the provocative "Law on Human Rights in the North" at home while going busy with diplomacy to fabricate "a resolution on human rights in the north" at the UN. 
					 Meanwhile, traitor Park Geun Hye is letting out a torrent of invective about "horror-ridden politics" and "need to improve human rights," malignantly slandering the Korean-style socialist system and agitating "defection from the north".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article terms this a blatant challenge to the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK, a legitimate sovereign state, and an unpardonable provocation aimed to "bring down its social system".
					
					 The on-going anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign is an act of treachery as it is zealously pursuant to the U.S. criminal scenario for aggression, it says, adding:
					
					 The most despicable and worst human rights abusers on the earth are the U.S. as it is engrossed in aggression and massacre, high-handed and arbitrary practices in different parts of the world and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors which have turned south Korea into the world's biggest grave yard of human rights and a veritable hell.
					
					 It is south Korea where the regime is deprived of sovereignty and human rights are totally trampled down.
					
					 She revived the "yusin" dictatorial system which had been thrown into the dumping ground of history and is violating elementary democratic freedom and rights, right to existence of the south Korean people. In fact, the Park group has turned south Korea into a huge slaughter-house. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, they are talking volumes about the "human rights in the north." This is mockery and insult to human rights.
					
					 The DPRK remains unperturbed by any "human rights" campaign of hostile forces as it is advancing and triumphing by dint of the single-minded unity and homogenous whole of all service personnel and people.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Bound to Face Same Tragic End as "Yusin" Dictator's: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Bound to Face Same Tragic End as "Yusin" Dictator's: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- October 26 marked the lapse of 37 years when "yusin" dictator Park Chung Hee was shot to death by his lackey.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary says: 
					
					 As shown by the disgraceful death of Park, all the fascist dictators met the same miserable ends. 
					
					 Great irony is that since a few days ago the puppet Defense Ministry of south Korea in a press release distributed in connection with the "37th memorial service" for traitor Park Chung Hee extolled Park, vociferating about "miracle on the bank of the River Han" and "foundation of independent defense." It even talked nonsense that "he served the liberation army in 1945" in a bid to paint the pro-Japanese lackey as a "patriot."
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that such disgusting farces were conceived by Park Geun Hye and being pushed ahead under her prodding.
					
					 Being such a wicked woman, she cut down the "budget for social welfare" but spent a stupendous amount of funds collected as taxes from the people for building the "Library in Memory of Park Chung Hee," the "Park Chung Hee Memorial Park," etc.
					
					 No wonder, south Koreans say "'yusin' dictator Park Chung Hee came out from his grave" while questioning "Who does Park Geun Hye serve: people or her father Park Chung Hee?"
					
					 The worst crisis of Park Geun Hye is the inevitable result of the Park Chung Hee-Park Geun Hye ruling method.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is making desperate efforts to garner sympathy by using her father's name to get rid of the ever-deepening quagmire of ruin but she can never escape the same tragic fate as her father.

articles.title: Commentator of Rodong Sinmun Sheds Light on Truth behind U.S.-led Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Commentator of Rodong Sinmun Sheds Light on Truth behind U.S.-led Sanctions against DPRK
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. and the south Korean Park Geun Hye regime are busy claiming their base sanctions against the DPRK were for protecting global peace and stability. They went the lengths of misleading the public opinion at home and abroad by billing that the DPRK would never endure its sufferings this time.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday carries a commentator's article laying bare the nature of their false propaganda.
					
					 Noting the persistent sanctions of the U.S. and the Park regime are a product of the U.S. inveterate hostile policy toward the DPRK, the article says:
					
					 The U.S. and the Park regime are asserting that their persistent sanctions are attributable to "provocations perpetrated by north Korea through nuclear tests" and its "human rights issue." But this is sheer sophism which will get them nowhere.
					
					 It is the keynote and goal of the policy being persistently pursued by the U.S. towards the DPRK to wipe it off the map by isolating it politically, suffocating it economically and pressurizing it by force of arms. The U.S. will remain unchanged in this policy.
					
					 Hence, the U.S. had blackmailed and pressurized the DPRK by leaving no means untried long before the latter had access to nukes. Moreover, after the end of the Cold War it adopted a policy of never co-existing with the DPRK unless the latter lowered the banner of socialism, and made no scruple of spouting abusive outpourings like "axis of evil" and "preemptive nuclear strike".
					
					 It is just the American-style sanctions, pressure and provocation invented for the mere reason that the DPRK's ideology and social system are different from the ones of the U.S. and the DPRK does not yield to the order of hegemony set by it. They will come to an end only when the latter dismantles its nukes and abandons the ideology and system chosen by itself and the nomenclature of the dignified DPRK disappears from the world map.
					
					 This is the main reason why the DPRK has branded the U.S. sanctions against it as unpardonable politically-motivated terrorism and taken a serious view of it and is resolutely standing against them with the toughest countermeasures.
					
					 The sanctions are a brigandish act of wantonly infringing upon the sovereignty and vital rights of the DPRK and a fabrication of the UN Security Council which has lost impartiality.
					
					 As for the nuclear tests, ballistic rocket test-fires and satellite launches being blamed by the U.S.-led hostile forces, member nations of the UNSC and other countries styling themselves developed ones have long conducted similar tests and launches one after another.
					
					 No article in the UN Charter and international law specifies that such acts should be termed "threat to peace" and be restricted.
					
					 Moreover, there is neither article nor provision that one country can receive treatment as a normal state if it accepts the American-style view on value guided by money-almighty logic and its requirements and if not, it should become a "target of sanctions for challenging global peace and security and committing human rights abuse."
					
					 The UNSC, shelving the heavy crimes committed by the U.S. and its vassal forces being censured by the public as chieftain of aggression and evils, cooked up a series of "sanctions resolutions" denying the DPRK's legitimate exercise of its sovereignty and threatening its right to existence.
					
					 It is, indeed, the height of double standards and the most unreasonable and unfair action.
					
					 The DPRK has neither recognized nor been bound to the UNSC's "sanctions resolutions" against it. This is because the fabrication of such "resolutions" is a vivid manifestation of the extremely abnormal and unreasonable nature of the U.S. and other hostile forces, not because the DPRK is "abnormal" as claimed by them.
					
					 The Don Quixote-style sanctions are nothing but a burlesque orchestrated by them out of their extreme ignorance of their rival and a reckless act of precipitating their self-destruction.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could unilaterally slap sanctions and pose threat to the DPRK in league with its vassal forces by brandishing its nuclear club.
					
					 If the U.S. and the Park regime persist in the reckless sanctions, its terminal will be a war in which the U.S. and the puppet regime will be wiped off the surface of the earth.
					
					 If they continue resorting to the suicidal sanctions against the DPRK, swimming against the trend of the times, they will meet their final doom with their lands reduced to ashes.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Stage Special Warfare Drill Targeting Core Facilities in DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Stage Special Warfare Drill Targeting Core Facilities in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- According to reports, the 353 special operation corps of the Navy of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and a brigade of the special warfare command of the south Korean puppet ground army staged a joint military drill for targeting core facilities of the DPRK in Kunsan, North Jolla Province from Oct. 12 to 26.
					 It was reported that the U.S. forces involved in the drill are stationed in Okinawa, Japan as a unit carrying out its mission to infiltrate into the DPRK in contingency.
					
					 These forces together with the puppet warmongers staged an intensive drill for airlifting the special unit to inland area of the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet warmongers incited war hysteria by infiltrating even agents of the air force tasked with carrying their mission to infiltrate into the DPRK in contingency.

articles.title: South Korean Online Paper Urges Park Geun Hye to Draw Last Lesson at Crossroads
articles.content:
South Korean Online Paper Urges Park Geun Hye to Draw Last Lesson at Crossroads
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on Oct. 26 said:
					 It has been confirmed that Choe Sun SIl received beforehand speeches of the "president" and speeches to be made by her at the "state council meeting." 
					
					 Voices are being heard from people of different social standings that Park Geun Hye should be impeached and step down.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Discloses That Park Geun Hye Has Revealed Top Secrets of Chongwadae
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Discloses That Park Geun Hye Has Revealed Top Secrets of Chongwadae
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- South Korean media including Hangyore and CBS disclosed in detail that traitor Park Geun Hye had revealed on a regular basis top secrets of Chongwadae to Choe Sun Sil, who is no more than an ordinary civilian who holds no official post.
					 It was the former secretary general of the Mir Foundation, the closest friend of Choe's, who told the truth.
					
					 CBS said that Park was not helped by Choe but she unofficially meddled in the state administration.

articles.title: S. Korean CBS Denounces Park Geun Hye for Bringing Worst Political Crisis
articles.content:
S. Korean CBS Denounces Park Geun Hye for Bringing Worst Political Crisis
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS on Wednesday denounced traitor Park Geun Hye for inviting the worst political crisis.
					 It said that the present crisis is the unprecedented one reminding one of the naked king in a fairy tale. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Park Geun Hye through her "apology to the people" admitted Choe Sun Sil's interference in state affairs only to confess that she had talked a lie.
					
					 People say it is not sincere apology as she failed to give instructions on investigation into Choe Sun Sil and express the will to punish her and clarify the issue of U Pyong U.
					
					 The "president" should give instructions on strict and special investigation into the case and totally reshuffle Chongwadae team of secretaries including U Pyong U, if she really wants to clear the people of the suspicion.

articles.title: S. Korean Online Paper Terms Choe Sun Sil Case Shocking
articles.content:
S. Korean Online Paper Terms Choe Sun Sil Case Shocking
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "Something unprecedented in feudal era occurs" was posted on the south Korean online paper Voice of People on Oct. 25.
					 Shocking is the report of JTBC that remaining in a computer left by Choe Sun Sil were not only a speech made by Park Geun Hye but a trace of correction made of it, the editorial deplored.
					
					 The computer files contained a speech made by Park at the time of her election as "president", her written impressions and the "Dresden declaration" published by her in Germany, and the time when the file was stored preceded the real time of its publication, it said, adding it is clear that Choe Sun Sil played a role in writing the speech of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Recalling that the chief of staff of Chongwadae refuted the case, saying "it was something unthinkable even in the feudal era, the editorial noted: But it is shocking as it was confirmed as truth.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Pro-reunification Patriot Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Pro-reunification Patriot Censured
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on Oct. 25 made public a statement in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' unjust suppression of Ri Chang Bok, chairman of permanent representatives of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said that the police of south Korea on October 21 summoned and investigated Ri Chang Bok on the charge of violation of the "Security Law" for the mere reason that he took part in a meeting of the chairmen of the south, north and overseas committees of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration in Shenyang, China in May.
					
					 It bitterly denounced such violence against Ri Chang Bok as intolerable mockery of the national unity and desire for reunification and another challenge to Koreans.
					
					 All Koreans will never pardon the Park Geun Hye regime's unethical crimes against reunification, it pointed out.
					
					 It appealed to south Korean bodies and people of different social standings to turn out as one in the nationwide struggle for wiping out the Park Geun Hye regime making last-ditch efforts obsessed with fascist rule and confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and for achieving independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: Chongwadae Witch Forsaken by Pro-Park Circle
articles.content:
Chongwadae Witch Forsaken by Pro-Park Circle
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea driven into a tight corner due to the power-backed scandals is being forsaken by the pro-Park circle of the "Saenuri Party" which she has regarded as her solid political base, according to the south Korean online paper MT on Oct. 26.
					 When Choe Sun Sil's interference in the administration is being disclosed in an unbroken chain in the wake of Park's "apology to the people," not only pro-Park members but non-Park ones of the "Saenuri Party" openly expressed disappointment at her.
					
					 Voices are being heard from the party that in order to tide over the crisis, the "president" is compelled to own responsibility for all critical remarks and ill-fame.
					
					 In this regard media said that the pro-Park circle is, in fact, little short of giving up the protection of the "president".
					
					 Meanwhile, even members of the "Meeting Loving Park Geun Hye" which had a share in helping Park seize power and tide over the political crisis while serving her for more than a decade are leaving the body one after another.

articles.title: Massive Actions Unabated in S. Korea to Judge Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Massive Actions Unabated in S. Korea to Judge Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Actions of south Korean people from all walks of life are running high to bring traitor Park Geun Hye to a court.
					 At least 80 civic and public organizations including the Society of April Revolution and the Solidarity for Progress held a press conference at the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on Oct. 26 to force Park to step down.
					
					 At the press conference the organizations said that evidence that Choe Sun Sil known as a person with actual influence played the "role" of the de facto "president" was disclosed through media, adding that unprecedented was that an individual, not a public official, monopolized the administration.
					
					 They insisted that the way of settling the case is for Park Geun Hye to step down as "president".
					
					 Over 50 civic and public organizations in Pusan area held a press conference at the plaza of Pusan Railway Station on the same day to demand Park step down.
					
					 At the press conference the chief of the Punsan Headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions said it is misfortune of all people that Park stays at the "presidential" seat even a day.
					
					 University students in Pusan City staged a surprise demonstration in the morning of Oct. 27 when Park appeared in the city.
					
					 On Oct. 25 the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and the People's Action for Democracy separately held press conferences where they said that the administration system is collapsing, "president" and all those responsible for the case should bear legal responsibility and Park should step down
					
					 Professors at Songgyungwan University in a declaration on the situation on Oct. 27 said that the incumbent "president" should let all the Cabinet and secretaries of Chongwadae resign as soon as possible and entrust everything to a new Cabinet, adding this is the way of preventing social confusion.
					
					 Organizations for impeaching Park Geun Hye are intensifying actions across south Korea.
					
					 Meanwhile, voices rejecting the deceptive apology made by Park and demanding her resignation are continuing to grow louder at the "National Assembly".
					
					 The Operation Committee of the NA held a plenary meeting on Oct. 26 at which an agenda item calling for filing a suit with the prosecution against U Pyong U who denied the demand to appear as a witness of the inspection of administration was raised and it was voted for with unanimous approval.

articles.title: "Choe Sun Sil Gate" Inseparable from Park Geun Hye: S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
"Choe Sun Sil Gate" Inseparable from Park Geun Hye: S. Korean Organization
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea made public a statement on Oct. 25.
					 The statement said it has been disclosed through media that Choe Sun Sil having real power behind Park Geun Hye read beforehand speeches of the "president" and her speeches to be made at the "state council meeting".
					
					 It pointed out that it has been confirmed that the "Choe Sun Sil gate" is inseparable from Chongwadae and "president," in particular.
					
					 Park should not attempt to refuse the probe into the truth and shut her mouth, it noted, adding:
					
					 She should probe the truth and cooperate in every matter so that the truth may be probed by media and the "National Assembly.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Marked in Venezuela, Guinea
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Marked in Venezuela, Guinea
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Papers and radio of Venezuela and Guinea carried special write-ups on the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Venezuelan newspaper Vea on Oct. 8 carried an article titled "Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un, the lineage of revolution continues" illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The article said in detail that Kim Jong Un has seen to it that the tasks assigned to all sectors and units are carried out on the strength of ideology and set it as an important requirement for Party building to accomplish the cohesion and unity of the whole party and that he is consolidating the ideological and volitional and moral unity based on one idea and one centre in every way.
					
					 Venezuela TV broadcasted Korean films "Songdowon International Children's Camp" and "Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum" on Oct. 10 and 11.
					
					 The Guinean newspaper Horoya on Oct. 9, in an article  titled "Party praised by the people", elaborated on the 70-odd history of the WPK that has always faithfully served the people and defended their interests with a high sense of responsibility.
					
					 Guinea TVs on Oct. 7 broadcasted Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK Is Outdated: Russian Social Body
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK Is Outdated: Russian Social Body
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "Blind Fool" on its website on Oct. 17.
					 The article made fun of the U.S. saying that following the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test the U.S. was proven to have acted a blind fool.
					
					 The U.S. present administration has come under fire for its policy of denying the strategic position of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK has bolstered up its nuclear force to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat and this has resulted in the DPRK that has emerged as a nuclear giant possessed of even H-bomb.
					
					 Thanks to the recent successful nuclear warhead explosion test, the country is now able to produce various type smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear warheads as many as it desires.
					
					 This is the result of the outdated hostile policy toward the DPRK and the anachronistic nuclear threat policy pursued by the U.S.
					
					 As long as the U.S. remains unchanged in its policy to stifle the DPRK, the country will continue to bolster up its nuclear capability both in quality and quantity.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop acting such a blind fool.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita 18a reunion internacional de partidos comunistas y del trabajo
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita 18a reunion internacional de partidos comunistas y del trabajo
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 28 un mensaje de felicitacion a la XVIII reunion internacional de los partidos comunistas y del trabajo.
					La misiva senala que esa reunion internacional, que se celebra siglo tras siglo y decada tras decada, ha cumplido satisfactoriamente con su mision y meta en intercambiar los exitos y experiencias alcanzados en la lucha por llevar adelante el movimiento socialista frustrando las maniobras antisocialistas de los imperialistas y fomentar el apoyo y solidaridad mutuos. 
					
					Desea grandes exitos de la reunion expresando la seguridad de que ella sera un importante motivo para que los partidos comunistas y del trabajo lleven adelante la causa socialista con la correcta estrategia y tacticas haciendo frente a la situacion en que se agrava mas la confrontacion entre las fuerzas independientes y las dominacionistas.

articles.title: Se imparte cursillo para participantes en el VII Congreso de la FGSC
articles.content:
Se imparte cursillo para participantes en el VII Congreso de la FGSC
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 en esta capital el cursillo para los participantes en el VII Congreso de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea. 
					Los oradores abordaron los problemas para asimilar profundamente la idea principal y contenido del mensaje enviado por el Presidente Kim Jong Un a los participantes en el VII Congreso de la FGSC y fortalecer esta organizacion como la politica masiva de la clase obrera fiel al Partido y poderoso destacamento combativo para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					En la ocasion se dio enfasis en el contenido principal de ese mensaje "El deber para la epoca de la clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y las tareas de las organizaciones sindicales".
					
					Los oradores destacaron la necesidad de defender con firmeza y glorificar eternamente las proezas de direccion de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il realizadas para el desarrollo de las labores de la entidad sindical.
					
					Llamaron a que la FGSC cumpla con su obligacion y mision de la organizacion politica de masas de la heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la ofensiva general de hoy para adelantar la victoria final de la construccion de potencia prospera bajo la orientacion del Presidente Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Banco Central acoge aniversario 70 de su fundacion
articles.content:
Banco Central acoge aniversario 70 de su fundacion
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Banco Central de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea conmemoro el 70o aniversario de su fundacion.
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo el 29 de octubre del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche el Banco Central de Corea del Norte, establecio el ventajoso sistema de administracion financiera al estilo coreano y condujo al banco a cumplir magnificamente su funcion y papel.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il desarrollo y enriquecio la autoctona idea y teoria del Presidente sobre la administracion financiera y preparo la guia directriz para mejorar las actividades financieras y bancarias.
					
					Oriento todas las operaciones financieras del banco a la materializacion de la politica financiera del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y dispenso grandes favores a los funcionarios del banco.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un hizo mejorar mas la funcion y el papel del Banco Central conforme a la demanda de la realidad en que entro en la etapa mas alta la construccion de la potencia socialista, y construir magnificamente su edificio a la orilla del pintoresco rio Taedong.
					
					Bajo la sabia direccion de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu, el Banco Central se convirtio en el competente organo de direccion financiera del Estado que desempena importante rol en el fortalecimiento de la base financiera del pais y garantiza en lo monetario la construccion socialista y la vida material y cultural del pueblo.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 28 el acto por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Banco Central.

articles.title: Efectuado acto para felicitar a campeonas de la Copa Mundial Sub-17 de FIFA
articles.content:
Efectuado acto para felicitar a campeonas de la Copa Mundial Sub-17 de FIFA
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto para felicitar a las futbolistas que vencieron en la Copa Mundial Sub-17 (f) de la FIFA de 2016.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios interesados y de las ramas deportivas, los jugadores y entrenadores, asi como los joves y ninos esclares de esta capital.
					
					Fueron otorgados a los miembros del equipo de futbol femenino los titules del partido y el Estado.
					
					Hubo discursos de felicitacion.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que las futbolistas, que ostentaron a todo el mundo el temperamento de la Corea del Songun, son hijas bravas de la patria, fidedignas protagonistas de la potencia juvenil y jinetes de Mallima.
					
					Encomendaron a las futbolistas que creen sin parar el mito deportivo de la Corea heroica en los juegos internacionales.
					
					Se escucharon las intervenciones de juramento.
					
					Los oradores expresaron la voluntad de demostrar a todo el mundo con medallas de oro el temperamento invencible de la Corea del Juche al prepararse como fuertes en lo ideo-espiritual y en lo fisico y tecnico.

articles.title: Comite ultramarino del 15 de Junio denuncia represion contra Ri Chang Bok
articles.content:
Comite ultramarino del 15 de Junio denuncia represion contra Ri Chang Bok
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Comite Ultramarino para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio publico el dia 25 una declaracion condenando la represion injusta de la banda titere surcoreana contra Ri Chang Bok, presidente del Comite Sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					La nota revelo que aplicando injustamente la "ley de seguridad", la policia surcoreana sometio el dia 21 al interrogatorio a Ri quien ha participado en la reunion de los presidentes del Norte, el Sur y el Ultramar del Comite Conjunto Nacional (CCN) para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, efectuada en mayo pasado en Shenyang de China.
					
					Condeno categoricamente ese hecho calificandolo de burla intolerable a la unidad y aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion y de otro desafio a la nacion coreana.
					
					Destaco que todos los coreanos no perdonaran nunca el crimen antietico y anti-reunificacion del "poder" de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Exhorto a las entidades de distintos estratos y la poblacion surcoreana a levantarse unanimemente en la lucha pannacional por exterminar el "poder" de Park Geun-hye, enfrascado en la tirania fascista y la confrontacion fratricida, y por lograr la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion.

articles.title: Belicistas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea ejercitan la batalla especial anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Belicistas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea ejercitan la batalla especial anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ACNC) -- Segun trascendidos, la escuadrilla de operaciones especiales 353 de las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas y los efectivos de una brigada de la comandancia de combates especiales de las fuerzas terrestres surcoreanas libraron desde el dia 12 hasta el 26 en Kunsan de la provincia de Jolla del Norte los ejercicios conjuntos suponiendo el ataque contra las instalaciones medulares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Los uniformados norteamericanos incorporados en el presente simulacro estan acampados en Okinawa, Japon, con la mision de infiltrar en las zonas de la RPDC en el tiempo de emergencia. 
					
					Esta unidad agresora se traslado al Sur de Corea y realizo con los belicistas surcoreanos los ejercicios de lanzamiento de comandos sobre las zonas interiores de la RPDC. 
					
					Los belicistas surcoreanos movilizaron esta vez hasta los agentes aerotransportados de las fuerzas aereas que se infiltraran en las regiones de la RPDC en el tiempo de emergencia. 
					
					Esta maniobra se desarrolla a puertas cerradas desde la decada de 1990. 
					
					Pero, esta vez los titeres surcoreanos la publicaron en la prensa diciendo que "ella se enfoca en destruir las instalaciones medulares del Norte".
